death.attack.radiation: %s just did a speedrun of evolution!
info.jei.block.reactorcore:
作業規格：
    最大 U235 輸出：500 kW
    V／渦輪：240 V

    最大 U238 輸出：250 kW
    V／渦輪：120 V

    最大安全溫度：4400 C

將核衰變的能量轉化為熱能，加以利用。先以水環繞四周，利用此熱能產生蒸氣。再置渦輪於水上來發電。至 wiki 了解設計細節！
info.jei.block.fusionreactorcore:
作業規格：
    最大輸出：5 MW
    V／渦輪：480 V
將氘與氚融合成電漿。此電漿若置於電磁鐵中，可將水加熱為蒸氣，用於發電。
info.jei.block.nuclearboiler: This machine can convert Uranium 238 and Yellowcake into Uranium Hexafluoride gas(UF6). If placed next to a Gas Centrifuge, the gas will automatically be inserted into it. Otherwise, it can be manually extracted using a pipe.
info.jei.block.chemicalextractor: This machine is used to extract radioactive elements from materials.
info.jei.block.electromagnet: This block is designed to contain the raw power of nature. It can be used to either contain Plasma from a Fusion Reactor, or contain particles produced by the Particle Injector.
info.jei.block.electromagneticbooster: This specialized electromagnet is used to increase the starting speed of Particle to a maximum of 40 m/s.
info.jei.block.electromagneticswitch: This specialized switch is capable of reversing the direction of a particle injected into an accelerator ring. I wonder what happens when two particles collide?
info.jei.block.gascentrifuge: This machine continuously converts Uranium Hexafluoride into U238 and U235 gas. However, the split is not equal. There is a 82.5% U238 to 17.5% U235 split in UF6. This means to make one pellet of U235 it will take roughly 14000mb of UF6, or 6 Uranium Ore. However not all hope is lost. The U238 pellets produced can be recycled into UF6 in the Nuclear Boiler!
info.jei.block.particleinjector: This machine accelerates particles to near-light speed, giving them strange properties. It can convert any item in the game to a particle. By default, it will accelerate particles into Anti-Matter. However, if two particles collide at full speed, a strange substance is formed. I wonder what happens when you poke it?
info.jei.block.quantumcapacitor:
Specs:
    Capacity: Infinite
    Max I/O Voltage: 1.92 kV
    Max I/O Power: 20 MW
    Max I/O Current: 10.41 kA
info.jei.block.radioisotopegenerator:
Specs U235 @ 1 Stack:
    Maximum Voltage: 120V
    Maximum Power: 12.8 kW
    Maximum Current: 106.66A

Specs: U238 @ 1 Stack
    Maximum Voltage: 120V
    Maximum Power: 6.4 kW
    Maximum Current: 53.33A
Tired of all that U238 lying around? Why not convert it directly into power instead of dealing with that dangerous Fission Reactor. The more pellets you add, the more power it generates!
info.jei.block.turbine: Converts steam into electricity. The turbine will produce a different amount of power depending on the steam sounce. You can see these outputs on the machine's info tab. Place a 3x3 grid and whack with a wrench to form a big turbine!
info.jei.block.teleporter: This powerful device allows for instant transportation anywhere in the world, across dimensions even! It uses no energy, but will only work one way. This means that if you want to go back and forth between locations, you will need 2 teleporters in total. To link two teleporters, right-click the sending block with a Frequency Card. Then right-click the recieving block with the same card. This will then link the two. Be careful though, as a teleporter can transmit to itself!
jei.info.block.reactorcore:
Operation Specs:
    Max U235 Output: 500 kW
    V/Turbine: 240 V

    Max U238 Output: 250 kW
    V/Turbine: 120 V

    Max Safe Temp: 4400 C

Harneses the power of nuclear decay, converting it into heat. Surround with water to harness this heat by generating steam. Placing Turbines on top of the water will generate electricity. See the wiki for design details!
jei.info.block.fusionreactorcore:
Operation Specs:
    Max Output: 5 MW
    V/Turbine: 480 V
Fuses Deuterium and Tritium into Plasma. This plasma, if contained in electromagnets, can be used to heat water into steam for power generation.
jei.info.block.electromagnet: This block is designed to contain the raw power of nature. It can be used to either contain Plasma from a Fusion Reactor, or contain particles produced by the Particle Injector.
jei.info.block.electromagneticbooster: This specialized electromagnet is used to increase the starting speed of Particle to a maximum of 40 m/s.
jei.info.block.electromagneticswitch: This specialized switch is capable of reversing the direction of a particle injected into an accelerator ring. I wonder what happens when two particles collide?
jei.info.block.gascentrifuge: This machine continuously converts Uranium Hexafluoride into U238 and U235 gas. However, the split is not equal. There is a 82.5% U238 to 17.5% U235 split in UF6. It takes 2500 U235 or U238 to make a respective pellet. The Centrifuge displays percentages denoting how soon till a pellet is formed. A biproduct of the Gas Centrifuge is Fissile Dust. It is formed at a rate of 10% per cycle ammount. It is worth noting that this 10% is not taken out of the previously mentioned split. It also has a percentage counter.
jei.info.block.particleinjector: This machine accelerates particles to near-light speed, giving them strange properties. It can convert any item in the game to a particle. By default, it will accelerate particles into Anti-Matter. However, if two particles collide at full speed, a strange substance is formed. I wonder what happens when you poke it?

Specs:
    Capacity: Infinite
    Max I/O Voltage: 1.92 kV
    Max I/O Power: 20 MW
    Max I/O Current: 10.41 kA
jei.info.block.radioisotopegenerator:
Specs U235 @ 1 Stack:
    Maximum Voltage: 120V
    Maximum Power: 12.8 kW
    Maximum Current: 106.66A

Specs: U238 @ 1 Stack
    Maximum Voltage: 120V
    Maximum Power: 6.4 kW
    Maximum Current: 53.33A
Tired of all that U238 lying around? Why not convert it directly into power instead of dealing with that dangerous Fission Reactor. The more pellets you add, the more power it generates!
jei.info.block.turbine: Converts steam into electricity. The turbine will produce a different amount of power depending on the steam sounce. You can see these outputs on the machine's info tab. Place a 3x3 grid and whack with a wrench to form a big turbine!
jei.info.block.teleporter: This powerful device allows for instant transportation anywhere in the world, across dimensions even! It uses no energy, but will only work one way. This means that if you want to go back and forth between locations, you will need 2 teleporters in total. To link two teleporters, right-click the sending block with a Frequency Card. Then right-click the recieving block with the same card. This will then link the two. Be careful though, as a teleporter can transmit to itself!
